data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Dividend Updates
data.news_body:
This has reference to our letter dated 14 Jan 2026. In terms of Reg 30 and 42 of SEBI (LODR) Reg. 2015  we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held on Wednesday 28 Jan 2026 has declared 2nd Interim Dividend for the FY 2025-26 @ Rs. 7.15/- per equity shares of face value of Rs. 10/- each amounting to Rs. 81.90 Crore out of the profits of the Company for the nine months ended  31 Dec 2025. Further the Board of Directors has fixed Tuesday 03 Feb 2026 as the record date for determining the shareholders entitled to receive 2nd Interim Dividend for FY 2025-26.

The meeting commenced at 1430 hours and concluded at 1630 hours.

data.news_body:
Garden Reach Shipbuilders & Engineers Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 28/01/2026 inter alia to consider and approve the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2025 and to declare 2nd Interim dividend for the Financial Year 2025-26 if any.

data.news_body:

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the Companys Code of Conduct for Prevention of Insider Trading and Fair disclosure of Unpublished Price Sensitive Information and SEBI (PIT) Reg 2015 we hereby inform that the Trading Window for dealing in Securities of the Company shall remain closed for Designated Person and their immediate relatives from 1st January 2026 till 48 hours after the declaration of Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and nine month ended 31st December 2025.

The date of the Board Meeting to consider the above Financial Results would be intimated to the Stock Exchanges in due course.

data.news_body:

data.news_body:

data.news_body:

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body:
In terms of Reg 30 of SEBI (LODR) Reg2015 we would like to inform that in pursuance to the Ministry of Defence Letter dated 03 Oct 2025 the President of India has appointed                Shri Niranjan Mukund Bhalerao (DIN : 10941391) as the Director (Finance) and Chief Financial Officer of the Company for a period of five years with effect from the date of his assumption of charge of the post or until further orders whichever is earliest.

Accordingly Shri Niranjan Mukund Bhalerao has assumed charge as Director (Finance) and CFO of the Company w.e.f. 06 Oct 2025 (AN). 

Detailed disclosure in this regard along with the brief profile of Shri Niranjan Mukund Bhalerao is enclosed.

data.caption: Extension Of Additional Charge Of Director (Finance) To Chairman & Managing Director Of The Company - Reg 30
data.news_body: In terms of Reg 30 of SEBI (LODR) and in continuation to our earlier intimation letter no. GRSE/BD-69/CA/11/2025-26 dated 15 May 2025 we would like to inform that pursuant to the Ministry of Defence letter no. 1/1(1)/ 2019/ D(NS) dated 03 Sep 2025 the Government has extended the Additional Charge of the post of Director (Finance) GRSE to Cmde Hari P R IN (Retd.) Chairman and Managing Director of the Company for a further period of 01 Month w.e.f. 01 Sep 2025 or till the appointment of a regular incumbent to the post or until further orders whichever is earliest.

data.caption:
Disclosure Under Reg 30 Of SEBI (LODR) Reg 2015
Imposition Of Fines By NSE And BSE
data.news_body:
In terms of Reg 30 we hereby inform you that the company has received notices dated 29 Aug 2025 from NSE and BSE regarding Non - compliance with regulations 17 17(2A) 18(1) 19(1)/19(2) 20(2)/(2A) and 21(2) of the SEBI LODR 2015. In View of the said non- Compliances a fine of Rs. 1254340 has been imposed by each of the stock exchanges NSE and BSE. 

In response the Company has submitted the letter dated 30 Aug 2025 that the appointment of Independent Directors including women independent Director on the Board is not in the hands of the Company and also beyond the Control of the Company. Therefore it has been requested that GRSE should not be held liable for the fines imposed and that the fines may be waived off. 

The detailed discloser is enclosed.

data.caption: Business Responsibility and Sustainability Reporting (BRSR)
data.news_body:
In terms of Reg 34(2)(f) of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 and circulars issued by the Stock Exchanges we are submitting herewith the Business Responsibility and Sustainability Report (BRSR) of the Company for the financial year 2024-25.

The BRSR being part of the Annual Report is also uploaded on the website of the Company.

data.caption: Reg. 34 (1) Annual Report.
data.news_body:
This is to inform that the 109th Annual General Meeting (AGM) of the Company will be held on Friday 19th September 2025 at 1030 hours through Video Conferencing (VC) / Other Audio-Visual Means (OAVM) to transact the business as set out in the AGM Notice dated 08th August 2025 in accordance with the applicable circulars issued by Ministry of Corporate Affairs and Securities and Exchange Board of India. The deemed venue for the 109th AGM shall be the Registered & Corporate Office of the Company at GRSE Bhavan 61 Garden Reach Road Kolkata - 700 024. 

Pursuant to Regulation 34(1) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we are submitting herewith the Annual Report 2024-25 of the Company along with the Notice of 109th AGM which is being sent through electronic mode to the Members of the Company.

The Annual Report 2024-25 along with the Notice of the 109th AGM is also uploaded on the Companys website at www.grse.in.

data.caption: Corporate Action-Board to consider Dividend
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the 109th Annual General Meeting (AGM) of the Company will be held on Friday 19 Sep 2025 at 1030 Hrs through VC/ OVAM to transact the business as set out in the AGM Notice dated 08 Aug 2025 in accordance with the applicable circulars issued by MCA and SEBI. The deemed venue for the 109th AGM shall be Registered and Corporate Office of the Company.

Further in terms of Reg 42 we wish to inform you that the Register of Members and Share Transfer Books of the Company shall remain closed from 13 Sep 2025 to 19 Sep 2025 (both days inclusive) for the purpose of 109th AGM and payment of dividend.

The final dividend for FY 2024-25 if approved at the 109th AGM will be payable within 30 days from the date of declaration to those members whose names appear on the Companys Register of Members/ Beneficial Owners as at the closure of business hours on 12 Sep 2025 (record date).

data.caption: Intimation Of 109Th Annual General Meeting Book Closure And Dividend
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the 109 AGM of the Company will be held on Friday 19 Sep 2025 at 1030 Hrs through Video Conferencing/ Other Audio Visual Means to transact the Business as set out in the AGM Notice dated 08 Aug 2025 in accordance with the applicable circulars issues by MCA and SEBI. The deemed venue for 109th AGM shall be Registered and Corporate Office of the Company. 

Further in terms of Reg 42 we wish to inform you that Register of Members and Share Transfer Books of the Company shall remain closed from 13 Sep 2025 to 19 Sep 2025 (both days inclusive) for the purpose of AGM and payment of final dividend.

The final dividend for FY 2024-25 if approved at the AGM will be payable within 30 days from the date of declaration to those members whose names appear on the Companys Register of Members/ Beneficial Owners as at the closure of business hours on 12 Sep 2025 (record date).

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body:
In terms of Reg 30 we would like to inform that the Ministry of Defence vide its letter dated 14 Jul 2025 (received on 15 Jul 2025) has appointed Shri Rajeev Prakash as Part-Time Official Director (Government Nominee Director) on the Board of Directors of the Company in place of Dr. Garima Bhagat.

Accordingly Dr. Garima Bhagat has relinquished the office of Government Nominee Director w.e.f. 15 Jul 2025 and Shri Rajeev Prakash has become Government Nominee Director w.e.f. 15 Jul 2025 until further orders from the Ministry of Defence.

This is for your information and record.

(b) M/s SunStone Denmark

The details are attached herewith

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Memorandum of Understanding /Agreements
data.news_body:
In terms of Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that during and official delegation visit to Norway the company has signed following Memorandum of Intent (MoI) and Memorandum of Understandings (MoUs):

(a) GRSE signed MoI with M/s Carsten Rehder Schiffsmakler and Reederei GmbH & Co. KG Germany for the construction of four (04) follow-on 7500 DWT Multi-Purpose Vessels. The firm contract for the vessels is expected to be finalized by 31 Aug 2025.

(b) MoU with M/s Aries Marine a Dubai based established and independent engineering and design firm for offshore Platform and vessel design. This MoU aims to facilitate collaboration on identifying and developing offshore orders for platforms designed by Aries and built by GRSE.

(c) GRSE also signed MoU with a Global Engine Manufacturer on the same day.

data.caption: Rumour verification - Regulation 30(11)
data.news_body:
This has reference to Notices issued by NSE and BSE on 04 Jun 2025 seeking clarification in relation to news / article published in Medial Publication and Rumour Verification.

In this regard we would like to submit that the information mentioned in the article/ news regarding signing of a MoU with M/s Kongsberg Norway is affirmative. The Company has entered into a non-binding MoU with M/s Kongsberg to receive design expertise for indigenous construction of a Polar Research Vessel. This represents a general understanding and has been signed in ordinary course of business.

We further submit that the said MoU does not involve any financial commitment or obligation and does not have any financial impact on the Company. Accordingly it does not constitute a material event under Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015.

The detail responses on the clarification sought by Stock exchanges is attached herewith.

data.caption: Clarification sought from Garden Reach Shipbuilders & Engineers Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Garden Reach Shipbuilders & Engineers Ltd on June 4 2025 with reference to news appeared in www.moneycontrol.com dated June 4 2025 quoting "Garden Reach Shipbuilders shares hit record high as it signs MoU for Indias first polar research ship"

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (LODR) Reg 2015 - Imposition Of Fines By NSE And BSE
data.news_body:
In terms of Reg 30 we hereby inform you that the Company has received Notices dated 29 May 2025 from NSE and BSE regarding non- compliance with Reg 17(1) 18(1) and 19(1)/19(2) of the SEBI LODR 2015. In view of said non-compliances a fine of Rs. 955800 has been imposed by each of the Stock Exchanges ie. NSE and BSE.

In response the Company has submitted a letter dated 30 May 2025 that the appointment of Independent Directors including Women Independent Director on the Board is not in the hands of the Company and also beyond the Control of the Company. Therefore it has been requested that GRSE should not be held liable for the fines imposed and that the fines may be waived off.   

The detailed disclosure is enclosed.

data.news_body:

data.caption: GRSE Become L1 To NGC Project - Reg 30
data.news_body:
In terms of Reg 30 and other applicable provisions of the SEBI (LODR) Reg 2015 we wish to inform you that GRSE attended the Commercial Negotiation Committee (CNC) meeting convened by the Ministry of Defence (MoD) for opening of commercial bids for the acquisition of eight (08) Next Generation Corvettes (NGC) on 21 May 2025 in New Delhi. 

During the meeting the Commercial bids were opened and it was noted that GRSE become the Lowest bidder (L1) for construction of Next Generation Corvettes (NGC) for Indian Navy. The  L1 bidder will be awarded five (5) NGC Ships at a likely value of more than Rs. 25000 crores. 

This is for your information and record.

data.caption: Update on board meeting
data.news_body:
The Board Meeting to be held on 12/05/2025 has been revised to 13/05/2025 This has reference to our letter No. SECY/GRSE/BD-69/CA/07/2025-26 dated 30 Apr 2025 on the subject matter of Intimation of Date of Board Meeting to inter alia consider and approve Audited Financial Results for the quarter and year ended 31st Mar 2025 and to recommend final dividend for the financial year 2024-25 if any.

This is to inform that due to unavoidable reason the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company which is scheduled to be held on Monday 12th May 2025 has been rescheduled and now will be held on Tuesday 13th May 2025. 

Accordingly the revised Trading Window Closure for dealing in securities of the Company for all Insiders including Designated Person Connected Person and their immediate relatives will be from 01st April 2025 to 15th May 2025.

This is for your information and record.

data.caption: Additional Charge Of Director (Corporate Planning And Personnel) To Chairman & Managing Director Of The Company - Reg 30
data.news_body:
In terms of Reg 30 of SEBI (LODR) Reg 2015 we wish to inform you that in pursuance to Ministry of Defence letter dated 02 May 2025 the Government has entrusted the additional charge of the post of the Director (Corporate Planning and Personnel) GRSE to Cmde Hari P R IN (Retd.) Chairman and Managing Director of the Company for a period of 03 months w.e.f. 01 May 2025 to 31 Jul 2025 or till appointment of a regular incumbent to the post or until further orders whichever is earliest.

Accordingly Cmde Hari P R IN (Retd.) Chairman and Managing Director of the Company is holding the Additional Charge of the position of Director (Corporate Planning and Personnel) of the Company.

This is for your information and record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body:
In terms of Reg 30 of SEBI (LODR) Reg 2015 we wish to inform you that DIG Subrato Ghosh ICG (Retd.) (DIN : 10205285) was appointed as a Director (Personnel) on the Board of the Company effective from 20 Jun 2023 for a period of commencing from the date of assumption of charge and continuing until the date of his superannuation or until further orders whichever is earlier as per the MoD letter dated 16 Jun 2023.

DIG Subrato Ghosh ICG (Retd.) is superannuating on 30 Apr 2025. Accordingly he will cease to hold office as Director (Personnel) of the company w.e.f. 01 May 2025.

This is for your kind information and record.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Date Of Board Meeting To Inter Alia Consider And Approve Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended 31 Mar 2025 And To Recommend Final Dividend For The Financial Year 2024-25 If Any.
data.news_body:
Garden Reach Shipbuilders & Engineers Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 12/05/2025 inter alia to consider and approve In terms of Reg 29 of the SEBI (LODR) Reg 2015 we wish to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Monday 12 May 2025 inter alia to consider and approve Audited Financial Results for the quarter and year ended 31 Mar 2025 and to recommend final dividend for the Financial Year 2024-25 if any.

Further in terms of the SEBI (PIT) Reg 2015 it was intimated / informed to the Stock Exchanges vide letter dated 26 Mar 2025 that the Trading Window for dealing in securities of the Company shall remain closed for all Insiders including Designated Person Connected Person and their immediate relatives from 01 Apr 2025 till 48 hours after the declaration of Financial Results for the quarter and year ended 31 Mar 2025. 

In view of the above the Trading Window for dealing in securities of the Company shall remain closed from 01 Apr 2025 to 14 May 2025.

This is for your information and record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body:
In terms of Reg 30 of SEBI (LODR) Reg 2015 as amended (the "SEBI Listing Regulations") we wish to inform you that as per the Companys Policy Competent Authority has approved re-designation of Cdr. Harish Kumar IN (Retd.) AGM (Regional Office Delhi) as General Manager I/C (Regional Office Delhi) with effect from 01 May 2025.

The brief profile of Cdr. Harish Kumar IN (Retd.) is enclosed.

data.caption: Intimation Regarding GRSE Will Sign Long-Term Lease Agreement With Syama Prasad Mookerjee Port Kolkata For Timber Pond Howrah (WB) - Reg 30
data.news_body:
In terms of Reg 30 and other applicable provisions of the SEBI (LODR) Reg 2015 we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held on Friday 25 Apr 2025 was apprised that GRSE will enter into a thirty-year lease agreement (non- renewable) with Syama Prasad Mookerjee Port Kolkata (SMPK) for a land parcel at Timber Pond Howrah.

The revenue generation from this initiative is not anticipated at this stage.

The detailed disclosure is enclosed for your information and record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body:
In terms of Reg 30 and other applicable provisions of SEBI(LODR) Reg 2015 we wish to inform you that the Company has received a Letter of Award on 08 Apr 2025 for the Construction and Delivery of two Coastal Research Vessel for the Geological Survey of India. 

The value of the award is Rs. 489.98 crore.

The company will execute the contract with the Geological Survey of India in due course and the same will be duly intimated to the Stock Exchanges later on.

data.news_body:
In terms of Reg 30 and other applicable provisions of SEBI (LODR) Reg  we wish to inform you that the Company has entered into non-binding MoU with M/s SWAN Defence and Heavy Industries Ltd to boost Indigenous Commercial Shipbuilding capabilities. 

In this regard the copy of the press release is enclosed as Annexure-I.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body:
In terms of Reg 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that Shri Sanjeeb Mohanty (DIN: 09559883) was appointed as a Part-Time Non-Official Director (Independent Director on the Board of the Company effective from 06 Apr 2022 for a period of three years by the Ministry of Defence Government of India vide its letter dated 25 Mar 2022. The three-year tenure of Shri Sanjeeb Mohanty concluded on 05 Apr 2025.

Accordingly Shri Sanjeeb Mohanty ceased to be an Independent Director of the Company with effect from 06 Apr 2025.

data.news_body:
Pursuant to Reg 8 (2) of SEBI (PIT) Reg 2015 and any other provisions as may be applicable we wish to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on 02 Apr  2025 approved the revised "Code of Conduct for prevention of Insider Trading and Fair Disclosure of Unpublished Price sensitive Information" (Insider Trading Code) for implementation in the Company.

The amended copy of the Insider Trading Code is enclosed herewith and the same is also available on the website of the Company.

data.news_body: In terms of Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we are enclosing herewith a copy of the press release titled Turnover Touches a New High: GRSE Records 32% YoY growth in the FY25.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Companys Code of Conduct for Prevention of Insider Trading and Fair Disclosure of Unpublished Price Sensitive Information and SEBI (PIT) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform that the Trading Window for dealing in securities of the Company shall remain closed for Designated Persons and their immediate relatives from 1st April 2025 till 48 hours after the declaration of the Financial Results for the quarter and year ended 31st March 2025.

The date of the Board Meeting to consider the above Financial Results would be intimated to the Stock Exchanges in due course.

This is for your information and record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release
data.news_body:
This has reference to our previous communication addressed to the Stock Exchanges vide letter No. SECY/GRSE/BD-69/10/2024-25 dated 22 Jun 2024 letter No. SECY/GRSE/BD-69/35/2024-25 dated  04 Oct 2024 and SECY/GRSE/BD-69/43/2024-25 dated 05 Dec 2024. 

In terms of Reg 30 and other applicable provisions of the SEBI LODR 2015 we wish to inform you that the Company has signed Contract for Construction and delivery of remaining two ships from the series of the additional four 7500 DWT Multi-Purpose Vessels (MPV) on 24 Mar 2025 at Hamburg Germany.

There has been no change in the Financial Implications of the Order/Contract.

Detailed disclosure and Press release in this regard is enclosed.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release
data.news_body:
In terms of Reg 30 and other applicable provisions of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that the company has signed MoU with PWD (Roads & Bridges) Nagaland for supply of 08 sets of Double Lane Modular Steel Bridges in the state of Nagaland. 

We are enclosing herewith a copy of the Press Release on the aforesaid matter. 

This is for your Information and record.

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (LODR) Reg 2015 - Imposition Of Penalty By NSE And BSE
data.news_body:
In terms of Reg 30  of SEBI LODR Reg 2015 we hereby inform you that the Company has received notices from NSE and BSE dated 17 Mar 2025 regarding non compliance with the provisions of Reg 17 (1) and 18 (1) of SEBI LODR 2015 pertaining to  non availability of required Independent Directors including Independent Woman Director on the Board of the Company and non constitution of the Audit Committee during the quarter ended 31 Dec 2024 and imposed fine of Rs. 552240 each by NSE and BSE. 

In response to the aforesaid notices the Company has replied that the action for appointment of Directors on to the Board of the CPSEs is not in the hands of the Company and also beyond the control of the Company. Accordingly as per the clause 3 (a) of the Policy for exemption of fines levied under SEBI SOP Circular the fines levied is to be waived off.

At present their is no immediate monetary impact on the financials of the Company.

Detailed disclosure is enclosed for your information.
